snippet.title: Shadow Fight 2 Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The creators of Vector bring you Shadow Fight 2, a nail-biting mix of classical Fighting and RPG. This game lets you equip countless lethal weapons and rare armor sets, and features dozens of lifelike-animated Martial Arts techniques! As the thrilling Fantasy storyline unfolds, you will fight numerous unique enemies and defeat evil demon bosses.

Available for Android, iOS!

Android: https://goo.gl/Q0SF3w
iOS: https://goo.gl/irB8AO
